data.title: Our Generous Donors and Community Partners
data.meta_description: Equinox serves adolescents and adults struggling with chemical dependency; survivors of domestic violence and their children as well as elderly victims of domestic abuse; adolescents and adults, along with their families, who are living with mental illness and at-risk and homeless young people.
data.text: We greatly appreciate each gift given in support of Equinox, and we have made every effort to ensure the accuracy of this listing. Please notify Christina Rajotte, Director of Development, of any inaccuracies or omissions by contacting her at (518) 434-6137 x5366 or crajotte@equinoxinc.org.
